background_description: The background consists primarily of large, dark grey rock formations in various sizes and shapes, with some patches of dry, sparse brown/reddish shrubbery and bare tree branches. Beyond the immediate enclosure, there are trees with vibrant yellow autumn foliage and several tall, light-colored city buildings under a bright, overcast sky. A glass-roofed walkway supported by brick pillars runs across the mid-ground.
explanation: The monkeys are clearly visible in the image and do not blend effectively with their environment. Their light brown/grey fur, while not starkly contrasting with all elements, stands out against the dominant dark grey of the rocks they are sitting on. Their distinct animal shapes and reddish faces are easily identifiable, preventing any significant form or color blending. The texture of their fur is also distinctly different from the rough, inorganic surfaces of the rocks and sparse vegetation. Overall, their presence is immediately apparent, indicating a lack of camouflage in this specific setting.
